name: Blox 3D World (itch)
description:
WORLD CREATION

Create beautiful worlds with simple clicks, from giant windmills to snowy castles and add animals, humans and birds for an amazing creative experience.

Add blocks, animated props, trees, buildings and animals with different weather and lighting conditions easily. Change colors of blocks, add animated props and watch as your world comes alive.

WALK MODE

"Walk" Mode lets you create a character and walk around the world ,with the ability to customize your character with different costumes and colors.

Library lets you discover creations from around the world, with thousands of downloadable worlds and creations.

SHARE CREATIONS

A super fun toy with a surprising amount of depth. No goals, no distractions, just a beautiful visual and audio experience with tons creative potential. 

BUILD ANYTHING

The ultimate sandbox experience for kids and adults alike, with relaxing gameplay and millions of possibilities. You can also export your creations as .txt files, and import them as well.

Product Page: https://blox3d.com/home

MacOS Desktop: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/blox-3d-world-creator/id1497298478
